Event 8 describes the process of constructing side-by-side videos using radio/light signals, which allows the Earth Twin to compare their ages with the Space Twin's. This event directly leads to the conclusion that the Space Twin aged 8 years while the Earth Twin aged 10 years. The other events mentioned (A, C, and D) do not directly contribute to the conclusion reached in event 9.
